qas.question: Who was responsible for Star Wars?
What was the first Indiana Jones movie?
When did the first Indiana Jones movie come out?
In what year did Spielberg become friends with George Lucas?
In what year did Blade Runner release?
In what year did the second Star Wars movie get released?
What was the first movie Ridley Scott got an Oscar nomination for?
What was the first movie George Lucas got an Oscar nomination for?

context: Next, Spielberg teamed with <b9_0>Star Wars<b9_0/> creator and friend <a0_0>George Lucas<a0_0/> on an action adventure film, <a3_0>Raiders of the Lost Ark<a3_0/>, the first of the Indiana Jones films. The archaeologist and adventurer hero Indiana Jones was played by <a1_0><a2_0>Harrison Ford<a2_0/><a1_0/> (whom Lucas had previously cast in his Star Wars films as Han Solo). The film was considered an homage to the cliffhanger serials of the Golden Age of Hollywood. It became the biggest film at the box office in <a4_0><b5_0><b6_0><b7_0>1981<b7_0/><b6_0/><b5_0/><a4_0/>, and the recipient of numerous Oscar nominations including Best Director (Spielberg's second nomination) and Best Picture (the second Spielberg film to be nominated for Best Picture). Raiders is still considered a landmark example of the action-adventure genre. The film also led to Ford's casting in Ridley Scott's <b8_0>Blade Runner<b8_0/>.
